docs.title: Kivy
docs.text:
To create a new standard project, type the following command: 

psproject kivy create <ProjectName> -p <path_to_kivy_project>

docs.title: example:
docs.text:
If you want to create a Xcode Project named MyProject and your kivy_project folder is relative to current location. 

psproject kivy create MyProject -p kivy_project
if kivy_project is located else where enter full path.

public class HelloWorld {

    func send_string(text: String) {
        print(text)
    }

}

docs.title: HelloWorld Part 2
docs.text:

Make callback from Swift to Python: helloworld.py

from swift_tools.swift_types import * # not mandatory

@wrapper
class HelloWorld:

    def __init__(self, callback: object)...

    def send_string(self, text: str): ...

    class Callbacks:
        def get_string(self, text: str)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. HelloWorld.swift
public class HelloWorld {

    var callback: PyCallback?

    func send_string(text: String) {
        callback?.get_string(
            text + " World"
        )
    }

}
